scripts.watch: node-sass --indent-type space --indent-width 2 --output-style expanded --linefeed lf --include-path include --embed-source-map --output target/watch/css --watch src/scss
scripts.build: node-sass --indent-type space --indent-width 2 --output-style expanded --linefeed lf --include-path include --embed-source-map --output target/dist/css src/scss
